INSERT INTO k_tour_headquarter.markersgps (pNo, mapx, mapy) SELECT kpi.pNo pNo, joinA.mapx mapx, joinA.mapy mapy FROM k_tour_headquarter.placeinfo kpi JOIN (SELECT tabsl.contentid contentid, tdc.mapx mapx, tdc.mapy mapy FROM tour_api_origin.areabasedsynclist2 tabsl JOIN tour_api_origin.detailcommon2 tdc USING (contentid)) joinA USING (contentid);
